column5: Just looking for some lodge suggestions on the northeast side of Rainy Lake around Red Gut and Seine Bays. I did a brief search but didn't find much. Want to be close to the muskie water thanks.

I just stayed a week at Taylors Cove and its a nice little resort. Clean and quiet. The don't have a website but if you're interested give Ed a call @ 807-481-2526. They are located between Red Gut and Seine. Fred

Taylors Cove, The Fisheries and Coppens are all right in the area you are looking at. The Landing on Red Gut is further up into the bay. http://thefisheries.com/http://www.coppensresort.com/http://thelandingonredgutbay.com/
Awesome, thanks for the replies guys
What's the boat traffic like on that part of Rainy? Is it really busy like LOTW?
